Description: Includes Delhi, Haryana, Punjab, Himachal Pradesh, Jammu & Kashmir, Uttarakhand, and Uttar Pradesh
Includes Karnataka, Kerala, Tamil Nadu, Telangana, and Andhra Pradesh
Includes West Bengal, Odisha, Bihar, Jharkhand, and the northeastern states (excluding Assam and Sikkim)
Includes Maharashtra, Goa, Gujarat, and Rajasthan
Includes Madhya Pradesh, Chhattisgarh, and Uttar Pradesh (partial)
Includes Assam, Sikkim, Meghalaya, Arunachal Pradesh, Nagaland, Manipur, Mizoram, and Tripura
